title: Blitzcrank moves 3x as fast as Usain Bolt.
body: I've seen Usain Bolt and I've seen Blitzcrank and he moves 3x as fast as him.

replies.body:
well yes his w increases his move speed and attack speed. (also blitz gets mobility boots as a sup so +105 move speed when not in combat + 330 baseroughly + w of 100 roughly so blitz moves at 620ish when not in combat and uses W not adding runes masteries other speed boosts)

Also Kennen e she gains 320 move speed for like 3 seconds and can go trough enemy units.
Isn't there a soft cap at 400~ that reduces your MS past that point

found it
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Movement_speed
"Movement speed caps
When the raw movement speed is greater than 415, there are two soft caps applied:

The raw speed between 415 and 490 gets multiplied by 80%.
The raw speed over 490 gets multiplied by 50%.
The two ranges have their reductions applied at the same time before being added back together."

The real speed would be 550ish, not 620ish

But there is no real max cap tho it just slightly decays. depending how much of a speed boost you got.
P.S. good calculations tho
Soft caps mean "building it past this point is harder" while hard caps, or just caps in general, mean "building it past this point is impossible"
